thread.title: Syndicate Bank Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 99 Specialist Officer Posts
thread.title_full: Syndicate Bank Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 99 Specialist Officer Posts

author: publisher5
title: Syndicate Bank Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 99 Specialist Officer Posts
text: Syndicate Bank Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 64 Specialist Officer Posts Syndicate Bank Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 64 Specialist Officer Posts : Syndicate Bank has published notification for the recruitment of 64 Specialist Officer vacancies in the various verticals/ Scales 2016 – 17. Eligible candidates may apply online from 01-03-2017 to 14-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. Syndicate Bank Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 64 Name of the Post: Specialist Officer 1. Manager (Law): 12 Posts 2. Manager Credit (CA): 31 Posts 3. Technical Officer (Civil): 15 Posts 4. Technical Officer (Electrical): 06 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 21 – 35 years for Post No. 01 and 21 – 30 years for Post No. 02, 03 & 04 as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST candidates, 03 years for OBC candidates & 10 years for PWD Candidates. For more relaxation details refer the notification. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess Bachelor Degree in Law (LLB) for Post No. 01, Qualified Chartered Accountant for Post No. 02, B-Tech/ BE Degree in Civil/ Electrical Engineering with minimum 50% aggregate marks (Minimum 45% marks for SC/ST/OBC/PWD) for Post No. 03 & 04 . Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Online Test & GD/ Interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 100/- (Intimation Charges) for SC/ ST/ PWD Candidates and Rs. 600/- (Intimation Charges + Application Fee) for all others including OBC candidates through online by using only Master/ Visa Debit or Credit cards or Internet Banking. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.syndicatebank.in from 01-03-2017 to 14-03-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid e mail id & passward 2. Candidates log on the website www.syndicatebank.in 3. Click on Careers & Sect the desired post 4. Again click on Apply Online 5. Read all instructions login yourself & fill all the details 6. Check once before submit the form 7. Now take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee 01-03-2017 Last Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee 14-03-2017 Closing Date for Editing Application Details 14-03-2017 Last Date for Printing Your Application 29-03-2017 For more details like salary, experience, reservation & other information click on the link given below…. Syndicate Bank Recruitment 2017
